From the non-state actors whose roles are equally important to those of participating states, namely the private sector." Whilst 120 world leaders are registered to attend the 13-day conference, top figures like China's Xi Jinping and his Indian counterpart Narendra Modi have planned not to come. Critics have now cast doubts on whether the talks will amount to any major global deals.

sentences.sentence: Hundreds of troops in World War II uniform marched across Moscow's Red Square in a reenactment of a historic wartime parade.
